Control.name: SuperStarXMLSkillsAbility
Control.OnInitialized: self.nameLabel = GetControl(self, "Name") self.alert = GetControl(self, "Alert") self.decrease = GetControl(self, "Decrease") self.alert.ability = self self.slot = GetControl(self, "Slot") self.slot.icon = GetControl(self.slot, "Icon") self.slot.ability = self self.lock = GetControl(self.slot, "Lock")
